document.full_text: rafa nadal and novak djokovic will have little chance to reflect on their epic madrid final as they cross the mediterranean to continue their burgeoning rivalry as top seeds in this week's rome masters.
document.title: nadal and djokovic rivalry heads to rome
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal and novak djokovic will have little chance to reflect on their epic madrid final as they cross the mediterranean to continue their burgeoning rivalry as top seeds in this week's rome masters.
